name: Yakul
description:
Yakul is in dire need of help, his stomach is growling and urgently need to go poopoo.

Gather money while rushing towards home. While you are at it, drink those yakult and prevent Yakul having a mess in the street.

DISCLAIMER: This is just an endorsement game school project, most of the audio are copyrighted and few of the assets are from the unity asset store.
